original_text: Nobody will be able to stop you. The Lord your God will cause everyone in the other nations to be afraid of you. They will shake with fear. He has promised to do that, everywhere that you go in the land.
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 말씀하신 대로 너희가 밟는 모든 땅 사람들에게 너희를 두려워하고 무서워하게 하시리니 너희를 능히 당할 사람이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Nobody will be able to stop you.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 당신을 막을 수 없을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God will cause everyone
in the other nations to be afraid of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족들이 당신을 두려워하게 하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He has promised to do that,
everywhere that you go in the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그 땅에서 가는 모든 곳에서 말입니다.
